nodes.text: Talay was a location in the galaxy that served as an Alliance to Restore the Republic regional headquarters and operations sector during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. Talay would be included in a map of the galaxy that listed safe worlds, starfighter hubs at level five or higher, regional headquarters and operations sectors, and deep space caches. Ord Pardron, an Alliance safe world, was nearby.

In canon, Talay first appeared in the 2017 boxed set and reference book by Daniel Wallace, Star Wars: The Rebel Files. Talay first appeared in the 1995 Star Wars Legends video game Star Wars: Dark Forces.

Due to an error in labeling, Star Wars: The Rebel Files states it to be within the Expansion Region. However, other sources such as Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary have labeled the area as the Mid Rim.
